name: Express source aggregation status
description: Notifies when Express source aggregation is completed.
subject: The application aggregation for $SOURCE_NAME #if($TASK_STATUS.equalsIgnoreCase("Error"))failed#{else}completed#end
body:
#set($url=$__global.productUrl + '/ui/a/admin/connections/sources-list')#if($TASK_STATUS.equalsIgnoreCase("Error"))

Dear recipient,

The application aggregation for the $SOURCE_NAME source failed on $COMPLETED_DATE.

Status: $TASK_STATUS

Go to the Sources page to view the source details.

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team

#else

Dear recipient,

The application aggregation for the $SOURCE_NAME source was completed on $COMPLETED_DATE.

Status: $TASK_STATUS

Total Aggregated Objects: $TOTAL_AGGREGATED_OBJECTS

Go to the Sources page to view the source details.

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team

#end
